attributes.additional_details: Referendum to see if the electorate wished to replace existing system of MPs with an internet based democracy which would allow the people to have their own say by suggesting and voting on those suggestions. The question is does your MP truly represent you or do you disagree with many ideas your MP has. If you find you disagree with ideas your MP has and want a system which represents how you feel as an individual then please sign this petition. VotePOINT51.com is in build in anticipation of a referendum success.
